title: Handle Medical Emergency Onboard a Flight
description: A passenger on a flight is experiencing a medical emergency. The flight crew contacts the ground-based operations center for assistance.

tasks.description: Establish communication with the flight crew and gather information about the passenger's condition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects critical details about the medical situation.

tasks.description: Connect the flight crew with a remote medical advisory service for professional guidance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully patches in a medical professional to assist the crew.

tasks.description: Based on medical advice, determine if the flight needs to be diverted to the nearest suitable airport and coordinate the diversion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the best diversion airport and coordinates with air traffic control and ground staff.
